text: The 2014 Badminton Asia Championships was the 34th edition of the Badminton Asia Championships. It was held in Gimcheon, South Korea, from April 22 to April 27. ==Venue== *Gimcheon Indoor Stadium. ==Medalists== {| |- |rowspan=2|Men's singles |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Women's singles |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Men's doubles |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Women's doubles |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Mixed doubles |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} ==2014 Badminton Asia Championships Final== This is the final result of the 2014 Badminton Asia Championships: {| class=wikitable style="white- space:nowrap;" !Category !Winners !Runners-up !Score |- |Men's singles | Lin Dan | Sho Sasaki |14–21, 21–9, 21–15 |- |Women's singles | Sung Ji-hyun | Wang Shixian |21–19, 21–15 |- |Men's doubles | Shin Baek-cheol Yoo Yeon-seong | Li Junhui Liu Yuchen |22–20, 21–17 |- |Women's doubles | Luo Ying Luo Yu | Jung Kyung-eun Kim Ha-na |21–18, 21–18 |- |Mixed doubles | Lee Chun Hei Chau Hoi Wah | Shin Baek-cheol Jang Ye-na |13–21, 21–15, 21–15 |} == References == ==External links== *Badminton Asia Championships 2014 Category:Badminton Asia Championships Asian Badminton Championships Category:Badminton tournaments in South Korea Category:2014 in South Korean sport Category:Gimcheon
title: 2014 Badminton Asia Championships
